title: PickNik Robotics to work with Motiv Space Systems on NASA ISAM mission
description:
For the mission, Motiv will be developing the robotic system while PickNik will provide robot motion planning and arm control software.

The post PickNik Robotics to work with Motiv Space Systems on NASA ISAM mission appeared first on The Robot Report.
